amendment.description: Amendment gives time-limited authority to the Federal Reserve Board to make exceptions to the Truth in Lending Act (TILA) and the Expedited Funds Availability Act (EFAA) for disaster areas declared so after February 28, 1997, when the board makes the determination that such an exception will alleviate hardships to the degree that it outweighs possible adverse effects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide regulatory relief for depository institutions affected by natural disasters occurring in during the winter of 1996 and 1997.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Vento amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
